detail_desc: Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch fabric with narrow shoulder straps.
Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Leather jacket with decorative twin seams, a pile collar with an adjustable tab and a two-way zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and turn-ups at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Tube scarf in soft, garter-stitched cotton with ribbed trims at the ends and a small imitation leather appliqué.
Rib-knit hat in a soft cotton blend with a roll-edge hem.

Jacket with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Crinkled jersey top in a relaxed fit with short sleeves, a wrapover front and ties at the waist that fasten at one side.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft velour with embroidery at the top, a press-stud on one shoulder and concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. For indoor use only.
Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and  shaped cups with a decorative flounce below. Concealed zip in the side, low crotch and straight, ankle-length legs.
Fitted vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a twisted racer back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, boxy-style jacked in cotton twill with contrasting colour trims front and back. Collar, a visible, contrasting colour zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with an adjustable strap and plastic fastener, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length jumpsuit in pleated, patterned jersey with a round elasticated neckline and short flutter sleeves. Elasticated waist with a decorative knot detail at the front and wide, straight legs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Biker shorts in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. High, elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Scarf in patterned cotton jersey. Size 39x39 cm.
Jacket in soft, windproof functional fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long dress in an airy weave with wide, asymmetric tiers in several layers and tie-top shoulder straps. Lined.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a shimmering metallic finish and concealed zip in one side. Asymmetric cut with a gently draping bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in airy, pleated chiffon. Regular waist with covered elastication. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, chest pocket with a decorative button, and straight hem with slits in the sides.
Pyjamas in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed-fit top with a print motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings in soft jersey with elastic at the top.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a twisted detail at the front.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather chukka boots with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button at the neckline.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and glossy heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton twill with a turn-down collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.

Saddle bag in grained imitation leather with a zipped inner compartment, a flap with a magnetic fastener, and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks. Lined. Size 7.5x18x19.5 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Picot trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Wide trousers in crushed velvet with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Ear decorations in metal embellished with faceted plastic beads and sparkly stones with an ear cuff at the top and pin at the bottom. Length 3 cm.

Double-breasted coat in an Italian wool blend with large, wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. One inner pocket with a button, and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Biker jacket in supple imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a ribbed elastic panel underneath and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Suede sandals with straps that have metal buckles at the top and a strap with a hook and loop fastening around the heel. Suede insoles and textured soles.
Alice band covered in leopard-print faux fur.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Underwired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned viscose jersey. V-neck with ties at the neckline and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Patterned top in crinkled jersey. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with studs down the sides.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Jumper in a fine-knit merino wool blend with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist, shaping darts at the back, concealed zip in one side and a gentle flare at the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

NICKI MINAJ x H&M. Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Small stand-up collar with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back, thin shoulder pads and long sleeves. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a sheen. V-neck, gathered yoke and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in a wool weave with satin details. Covered buttons at the front, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Satin lining. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat woven in a wool blend with wide notch lapels and long raglan sleeves. Large patch front pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Underwired bra in lace with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Pencil case with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a matching skirt in tulle. Top with reversible sequins at the front (sizes 1½-2Y with normal sequins). Lined skirt with an elasticated waist.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft satin with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and sparkly stone press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trainers in suede with mesh details, lacing at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Jersey top with glittery thread stripes and short cap sleeves.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
